extName.message: DanMage - NicoNico-style chat on multi sites

extDescription.message: Bring NicoNico-style chat to Twitch, YouTube and Crunchyroll!

opacityOption.description: Explain the option to adjust danmaku opacity.

fontSizeOption.description: Explain the option to adjust the scale of font size.

maxNumOption.description: Explain the option to adjusst maximum number of scrolling chats.

speedOption.description: Explain the option to adjusst the speed for scrolling chats.

topMarginOption.description: Explain the option to add top margins.

bottomMarginOption.description: Explain the option to add bottom margins.

fontFamilyOption.description: Explain the option to set font family.

enableScrollingOption.description: Explain the option to enable or disable chat scrolling.

userNameOption.description: Explain the option to show or hide user name.

distributionStyleOption.description: Explain the option to choose distribution style.

RandomDistributionStyle.description: An enum value for one distribution style.

TopDownDistributionStyle.description: An enum value for one distribution style.

resetOption.description: Explain the option to reset all settings.

blockRuleInputPlaceHolder.description: Place holder for the input to add new a block rule.

addBlockRuleButton.description: Text on the button to add a new block rule.

KeywordBlockKind.description: An enum value for one type of block rules.

RegExpBlockKind.description: An enum value for one type of block rules.

submitNewChatButton.description: Text on the button to submit a new chat.

chatInputPlaceHolderSignedOut.description: Place holder for the input to submit a new chat.

chatInputPlaceHolderSignedIn.description: Place holder for the input to submit a new chat.

firstSignInReminder.description: First part before URL in 'Sign in www.danmage.com with your Google account to be able to post chats.'.

secondSignInReminder.message: with your Google account to be able to post chats.
secondSignInReminder.description: Second part after URL in 'Sign in www.danmage.com with your Google account to be able to post chats.'

signInButton.description: Text on the button to sign in.

signOutButton.description: Text on the button to sign out.

welcomeMessage.description: The message to welcome a signed-in user.

welcomeWithNameMessage.description: The message to welcome a signed-in user with name.

welcomeWithNameEndingMessage.description: The ending message to welcome a signed in user with name.

firstExplanation.description: First part before URL in 'Chat will be posted to www.danmage.com.'

secondExplanation.description: Second part after URL in 'Chat will be posted to www.danmage.com.'
